attributes.action: Reduce the rate of Employers Nation al Insurance for employees over State Retirement Age
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Employers are now encouraged and required to employ ro retain employees over State Retirement Age (SRA).  When an employee who is a member of an Occupational Pension Scheme reaches their SRA the pension contribution for an employer increases from 9.3% to 12.8%.  This is an addtional tax burden on employers who are clearly providing an occupational pension scheme is surely not just.
